ygData.subject: Re: OT - Re: [eq_wizards] Mana Management, and other topics
ygData.msgSnippet: My bad, the web URL for Forte(if anyone is interested) is www.forteinc.com They offer a free version but I m not sure about it s filtering abilities. ... Jerod
ygData.messageBody:
My bad, the web URL for Forte(if anyone is interested) is
www.forteinc.com

They offer a free version but I'm not sure about it's filtering
abilities.

On Wed, 21 Apr 1999 07:44:10 GMT, you wrote:

>I use Forte Inc.'s Agent as my mail and newsgroup reader and I don't
>think it can be rivaled. The filtering is as complex as you want to
>get and easy as you need it to be if you're new to filtering.
Jerod K Weimer, MCP
